fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 0.40 points to settle at 17,624.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 2.59% to 11.63. ICICI Bank, Reliance Industries and HCL Technologies were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The April 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 April 2023.
